channel.title: Best Browser/Operating System
channel.description:
I've been bored for the last week and decided to make a new layout, which is under development, then decided to log browser statistics, which is working, then stole sppts idea to make a PHP graph-drawer, which is working. These 3 combined allow me to display dynamic graphs based on what I datamine from clients. So, without further ado, here are the graphs: [url=http://newbiehacker.noclip.org/pages/browsergraph.php?width=1000&height=520][img]http://newbiehacker.noclip.org/pages/browsergraph.php[/img][/url] [url=http://newbiehacker.noclip.org/pages/osgraph.php?width=1000&height=520][img]http://newbiehacker.noclip.org/pages/osgraph.php[/img][/url] Your data has been added to the graph just be viewing this page, thanks! [b]Browsers that aren't in the graph will be added to the graph when used![/b]
Come on firefox![br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 15, 2007, 07:31:58 AM[/size][hr]I added refresh protection and reset the database as some douche was upping windows and firefox. enjoy.

item.title: Best Browser/Operating System
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

ThugLife:

How does the Memory leak effect anyone, since it certainly hasnt effected me

I used to have 768 MB ram. No pagefile.

Read full topic

item.title: Best Browser/Operating System
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

[me=Lothy]shrugs[/me]

Load the RS browser and then go to the world select screen. Do that a few times, loading the applet each time, and take a look at the memory consumption.
It’s poor design and even shitter programming. That alone should be reason enough to use something else.

Read full topic

item.title: Best Browser/Operating System
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

newbiehacker:

well then please tell me why the majority of people are using it?

http://www.populartechnology.net/2005/01/firefox-new-religion.html

They’ve clearly been brainwashed. I myself use Opera. No memory leak ‘features’ here fellas.

[quote=“XxKanexX, post:86, topic:164897”][quote author=Sync link=topic=223816.msg1943222#msg1943222 date=1198249900]

my internet is already slow 1.6mb download, 200kb upload.
[/quote]You call that fucking slow, I only have 160 kb/s and that’s almost as fast as you can get in Australia, but the new Prime Minister has promised us “World Class Broadband”.

That’s as fast as you can get? Where in Australia are you?
I’m buying ADSL2 next year.
20mb+ Download.

Check Optus or AAPT broadband.[/quote]
Not all exchanges are adsl2 enabled, and, furthermore, the speed offered by the connection can drop significantly because of distance.
Be sure to check that you’re physically close to your exchange (cable length wise) before getting it, otherwise you may be in for a shock if you’re too far away.

Read full topic

item.title: Best Browser/Operating System
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

I use IE, unless you get AD’s or something you might have something on your computer. Right now i can browse through google & limewire looking for porn, and i have NO anti virus and i bet you i won’t get any virus. Plus i know when i have a virus, and when i do, i do not type anything valuable, either it be personal or economic wise.

I like it, i really don’t know why FF is good, really i don’t care how it renders things or what it has, or how it looks like, although IE looks pretty sexy, to you it might not. All i care is that it goes to websites, ++ my internet is already slow 1.6mb download, 200kb upload.

Read full topic

item.title: Best Browser/Operating System
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

Zameix:

Most of you guys (i said most…) are allways saying I.E sucks, and FF rules etc, yes i use FF, but why is it you say it sucks so bad? you never back up why it sucks. I only know 1 advantage to FF is addons, skins etc. That’s it… so explain fools.

IE sucks at rendering HTML/CSS/JS correctly, and that is basically all it is required to do. It’s also susceptible to viruses and such. You clearly only use FF because you jumped on the bandwagon.

Read full topic

item.title: Best Browser/Operating System
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

Zameix:

Most of you guys (i said most…) are allways saying I.E sucks, and FF rules etc, yes i use FF, but why is it you say it sucks so bad? you never back up why it sucks. I only know 1 advantage to FF is addons, skins etc. That’s it… so explain fools.

We only don’t mention it because we’ve said it so much. Obviously you haven’t been here long.

It’s slow, more prone to virus’s, annoying interface (ugly) and Firefox has an open source advantage, unlike it; you can customize much more than just the skins. Along with that then is the addons, like the Ad-Blocks and such.
Why don’t you google it for more information?

People just never google these days!

Read full topic

item.title: Best Browser/Operating System
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

No, my point was to show you what I first said.

You can not base the majority of anything else but this forum if you’re using results from this forum.

I know it’s going to be accurate of THIS forum. But it’s not accurate for the WORLD.

This forum could be a FF biased forum compared to the world.

Some websites could have a majority of IE users. Others a majority of Safari.

I’m just saying. You can not use this majority as THE majority.

Read full topic

[quote=“SomethingToHide, post:71, topic:164897”]If any of you decide to base your facts off of THIS thread’s graph you are just ignorant to the rest of the world.

You can’t conduct a study on one forum and expect the rest of the world to be based off of said results.

With that said, Legit > you all and you should probably give up. Opera ftw.[/quote]
I can conduct a study in one forum and expect it to be accurate of this forum.

Also, whether legit is >,==,< to me has no relevenacy to the point of this thread and that was a pretty pointless comment.

item.title: Best Browser/Operating System
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

I read every single post in this thread. I liked the argument, but i’ve never used opera so i can’t comment on that, but i’ve used FF and imo horrible user interface. I don’t find anything good or awesome about it. As to safari, its good to load javascripts or whatever it is, which infact i tried to load runescape, went slow as fuck.(I think i used infact wrong). IE doesn’t give me viruses, google gives you viruses no need to search for porn when there is limewire.

By far IE is the best, its nice, easy to use(For Me), let the ridiculing begin.

As for OS’es, I like XP, vista is only good because it looks good, i don’t like it, plus all the bad reviews i’ve read.

I am going to try linux (kubuntu) on a dual boot with Win XP. But later on, when i know what the hell i can do on it.

The other things i didn’t mention i never tried it, so i can’t comment.

Read full topic
